source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_00<tab>When ceruleum is thin on the ground, plots grow thick. None other than Papawazu, the nine-time Employee of the Moon, wishes to consort with you.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_00<tab>ブルーフォグの仲介人パパワズにも、何か事情があるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_01<tab>Papawazu is inclined to think that porters are pilfering the processed ceruleum coming out of the plant. You have his leave to question them; approach the spirited porter and express your /doubt.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_01<tab>青燐精製所から送られてきた「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874A01 /var>」が横流しされている疑いがあるらしい。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874A01 /var>を運んでいる「負けん気の強い荷運び人」に、エモート「問い詰める」をしてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_02<tab>Unbowed by your withering skepticism, the porter protests his innocence. Assume for a moment he is not guilty until so proven, and check the barrels of processed ceruleum as he bade you.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_02<tab>負けん気の強い荷運び人を問い詰めたが、彼は濡れ衣を主張している。彼の言うとおり、保管場所に置かれている「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8CE901 /var>」を調べてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_03<tab>Resigned to spending a few interminable bells inventorying the ceruleum, you are pleasantly surprised to be attacked by coblyns instead. You are less charmed by what they were doing: drinking the ceruleum. Speak with the spirited porter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8CE901 /var>を調べたところ、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D501 /var>が現れた。「負けん気の強い荷運び人」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_04<tab>Lucky for you, the porter's amazement at the coblyns' obnoxious choice of beverage usurps any righteous fury he might have unleashed. Additional ceruleum from the plant will make up for the current shortfall. Report the facts to Papawazu.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_04<tab>負けん気の強い荷運び人は、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D501 /var>が飲んでしまった分を、改めて青燐精製所から運んでくるという。ブルーフォグの「パパワズ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_05<tab>Papawazu receives the news with his characteristic aplomb of sorts. It seems the porters will get much-needed protection from fell creatures, but no doubt be assigned the blame for the impending price gouge...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_SEQ_05<tab>パパワズに犯人について報告した。彼は魔物対策に護衛の雇用を検討しているようだが……そのぶん、青燐水が値上がりしそうだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_TODO_00<tab>Question the spirited porter with much /doubt.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_TODO_00<tab>負けん気の強い荷運び人に「問い詰める」をする
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_TODO_02<tab>負けん気の強い荷運び人に報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_000<tab>Sooo, we may have a shared problem here, as <var 1A 02 /var>un<var 1A 01 /var>likely as that sounds. We would love─but <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var>─to ship ceruleum. <var 1A 02 /var>But<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_000ん～、私どもと致しましても、
「」の出荷は迅速に行いたいのですが、
少々トラブルがありましてね……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_001<tab>There's far too little of it coming out of the plant. I sus<var 1A 02 /var>pect<var 1A 01 /var> thievery! A little skimming off the top, hmmm?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_001「青燐精製所」から送られてきた青燐水が、
大幅に目減りしてるんですよ。
これはきっと、誰かが横流ししてるに違いありません。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_002<tab>Furthermore, I sus<var 1A 02 /var>pect<var 1A 01 /var> the porters! I <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> just going to keep an eye─wouldn't want trouble with the labor confraternities, you know! But <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are welcome to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and question them... Aaand I use one problem to solve another! Mmm, <var 1A 02 /var>brilliant<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_002ん～、私は犯人は荷運び人だと踏んでるんですがね。
急ぎの用であれば、集積所にいる荷運び人の頭を
「問い詰めて」みてくださいよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_010<tab>Bless me, Nald'thal, let there be no creature features today, Your name be praised. I don't get paid enough for this...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_010ふぅ～、ここいらは魔物が強くて、
物資の運搬も命がけだぜ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_020<tab>Stealin' ceruleum? One, I oughta punch you in the face for impugnin' my reputation. Two, you think I'd still be here with my arse out in the wind if I'd made off with that kind of loot?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_020なに、「」を横流ししてないかだと！？
ふざけんな、とんだ濡れ衣だ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_021<tab>We're doin' honest work out here with all manner of nasties just yalms away. You doubt my words, go check the ceruleum in those barrels. Ain't nothin' missin' from what's in the books!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_021俺たちは言われたとおり、命を削ってキッチリ運んでるぜ！？
疑うんなら、保管場所にある「」を、
直接お前が調べてみろよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_030<tab>Whyn't you go home before you get any more useless? There's creatures out here would take your arm off without even creasin' your shirt.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_030なんだぁ、何か用かよ？
怪我する前に帰りな！

TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_DUMMY_000_040「」にアクセス
→「青燐だいしゅきコブラン」がポップ2匹　倒す。1個目

TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_DUMMY_000_050「」にアクセス
→「青燐だいしゅきコブラン」がポップ2匹　倒す。2個目

TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_DUMMY_000_060「」にアクセス
→「青燐だいしゅきコブラン」がポップ2匹　倒す。3個目

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_070<tab>Coblyns!? <var 1A 02 /var>Drinking<var 1A 01 /var> ceruleum? Now I have seen everything.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_070なんと、コブランが「」を飲んでやがったのか！
あんなモンを飲む魔物がいるとは驚きだぜ。
まったく油断も隙もねぇ……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_071<tab>Well, I guess I don't need to get me a champion from the confraternity, that's a relief. But we'll have to make an extra trip to the plant to make up for what those cursed topers put down the hatch.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_NPCA_000_071濡れ衣は晴れたようだが……仕様がねぇな。
足りないぶんはもう一度、精製所から運んでくるとするか。
……次からは保管場所に気をつけねぇと。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_080<tab><var 1A 02 /var>In<var 1A 01 /var>teresting! Coblyns, coblyns...no, I <var 1A 02 /var>def<var 1A 01 /var>initely didn't order any. We do sometimes, though, for business reasons. Everybody does it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_080ん～、なるほど……コブランですか。
犯人がわかったようでなによりですよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_081<tab>Shush, you can stop talking now. Sooo, I'll have to hire guards for that whole area, and, oh, an <var 1A 02 /var>idea<var 1A 01 /var>─raise the price and call it a special security surcharge...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB811_00920_PAPAWAZU_000_081今後は、魔物対策に護衛をつける必要がありますね。
ん～、護衛にかかる経費を理由にして、
ついでに値を吊り上げましょうかね。
